Control Name: SA-9 (4) CONSISTENT INTERESTS OF CONSUMERS AND PROVIDERS
Control Statement: The organization employs [Assignment: organization-defined security safeguards] to ensure that the interests of [Assignment: organization-defined external service providers] are consistent with and reflect organizational interests.
